caption.p: Genotoxic effects of S. molle L. essential oil. In (a) the results of the micronuclei (expressed as nuclear division index), in (b) the numerical chromosomal instability, and in (c) the index of DNA damage. Data expressed as mean Â± standard deviation and it was performed at each test triplicate (n=3). In each graph the different letters represent a statistically significant difference at p <0.05.
